attributes.action: Not in my name - send no troops to the Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
Britain has helped overthrow a democratic government in the Ukraine and with its allies is propping up a racist regime using fascist troops against indigenous Russians in the Ukraine.

This is with a view to pushing NATO further to the East and surround Russia.

Now Britain is sending troops to the Ukraine.

Britain must stop this course of action as it is leading us to a new and awful conflict.
